abstract: The hawkish tone of minutes from the Fed’s last meeting, in which policymakers signaled a willingness to halt their rate-cutting campaign, sent the stock indexes tumbling.
snippet: The hawkish tone of minutes from the Fed’s last meeting, in which policymakers signaled a willingness to halt their rate-cutting campaign, sent the stock indexes tumbling.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve’s aggressive rate-cutting campaign may be at an end.

headline.main: Concerns From Fed Reverberate on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Concerns in Fed Minutes Reverberate on Wall Street
